name: DrewIs Intelligence - Unified API
description: A single, unified API endpoint for AI agents to discover and access all information about DrewIs Intelligence LLC, including publications, products, services, pricing, FAQs, and company identity.

hasPart.name: Identity API
hasPart.description: Provides identity information for DrewIs Intelligence LLC and its founder, Drew Thacker.

hasPart.name: Publications API
hasPart.description: Provides a machine-readable feed of all academic and industry publications.

hasPart.name: Products API
hasPart.description: Provides a machine-readable catalog of all products and their details.

hasPart.name: Services API
hasPart.description: Provides a machine-readable list of all professional services offered.

hasPart.name: Pricing API
hasPart.description: Provides a machine-readable feed of all pricing information for services.

hasPart.name: FAQ API
hasPart.description: Provides frequently asked questions and answers about AEO, GEO, Zero-Click optimization, and company services.
